instanceCountSummary.description:
A list containing the counts of virtual machines in each possible power state for each zone if enabled, as known by the StandbyPool resource provider.
If zones are not enabled on the attached VMSS, the list will contain a single entry with null zone values.
Note: any updates to pool resources outside of StandbyPoolRP (i.e deleting a VM through portal) are not reflected here.
Note: any resources in the Running state may still be installing extensions / not fully provisioned.

provisioningState.description: Displays the provisioning state of the standby pool

StandbyVirtualMachineResource.description: Concrete proxy resource types can be created by aliasing this type using a specific property type.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

value.description: The StandbyVirtualMachineResource items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

virtualMachineResourceId.description: Resource id of the virtual machine.

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

id.description: Specifies ARM resource id of the subnet.

VirtualMachineInstanceCountSummary.description:
Contains the counts of VMs in each power state in a given zone, fault domain, as known by the StandbyPool resource provider.
Note: any updates to pool resources outside of StandbyPoolRP (i.e deleting a VM through portal) are not reflected here.
Note: any resources in the Running state may still be installing extensions / not fully provisioned.

zone.description: The zone that the provided counts are in. This is null if zones are not enabled on the attached VMSS.

instanceCountsByState.description: The count of pooled resources in each state for the given zone.

values.name: Running
values.description: The virtual machine is up and running.

values.name: Deallocated
values.description: The virtual machine has released the lease on the underlying hardware and is powered off.
